short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple IDE for STM8S with hairBoot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
STM8S 小容量系列芯片简便在线IDE，
集代码编辑、编译，固件烧录，串口调试功能于一体，只需安装该应用即可上手STM8S轻应用开发~
Note：需配合hairBoot(https://github.com/Zepan/hairBoot.git)使用，
帮助文档见：http://www.uclink.org/?p=26

A simple and convenient online IDE for STM8S low-density family.
Set the code editor, compiler, firmware flasher, serial debugging functions together, and just install the application to get started with STM8S light application development ~
